extension.name: Eshop Reminder
extension.author: Giang Dinh Truong
extension.description: This plugin sends the email automatically to store's admin to reminder when products in store are nearly out of stock.

field.name: last_run
field.label: Last Run Time
field.description: Store Last Run Time of the plugin.

field.name: time_period
field.label: Time Period (Minutes)
field.description: Please enter a period of time in minutes to send reminder. Default is 30.

field.name: number_products
field.label: Number Products
field.description: Number of products which you would like to send the reminder each time the plugin run.

field.name: received_emails
field.label: Received Emails
field.description: Please enter the received emails here (divided by comma). If it is empty, then store's email from configuration of EShop will be used.
